author: Admin
title: My Dent Guy Offers Convenient In-Shop and Mobile Paintless Dent Repair Services in Naples, FL
text:
Naples, FL â€“ My Dent Guy, a leading provider of high-quality
paintless dent repair services, is pleased to announce its convenient in-shop and mobile services in Naples, FL. With a commitment to exceptional customer service, My Dent Guy is revolutionizing the dent repair industry by offering efficient and cost-effective solutions for vehicles of all makes and models.
Paintless dent repair (PDR) is a specialized technique that allows for the removal of dents, dings, and hail damage without the need for traditional bodywork, sanding, or repainting. With over 11 years of experience, My Dent Guyâ€™s PDR expertise has perfected this method, ensuring that customers receive outstanding results with minimal disruption to their daily lives.
Convenience is a top priority for My Dent Guy. Understanding that time is valuable, the company offers both in-shop and mobile services to accommodate its customersâ€™ busy schedules. Their state-of-the-art facility in Naples, FL, is equipped with cutting-edge tools and equipment, enabling their technicians to handle any dent repair job, from minor door dings to more extensive damage. Customers can drop off their vehicles at the shop, and the skilled technician at My Dent Guy will promptly restore them to their original condition.
For those unable to visit the shop,
My Dent Guyâ€™s mobile service brings the expertise directly to the customerâ€™s location. Whether at home, work, or even during a shopping trip, customers can conveniently schedule an appointment, and My Dent Guyâ€™s technician will arrive fully equipped to tackle the dent repair on-site. This hassle-free service saves customers time and eliminates the need for multiple trips to the shop.
â€œWe understand the stress and inconvenience that dents and dings can cause for vehicle owners,â€ said Mark Tucker, of My Dent Guy. â€œThatâ€™s why we are committed to providing our customers in Naples, FL, with exceptional paintless dent repair services that are convenient and affordable. Whether they choose to visit our shop or utilize our mobile service, we guarantee outstanding results and a seamless experience.â€
My Dent Guyâ€™s commitment to customer satisfaction extends beyond their repair services. They offer free estimates and competitive pricing, to make the process as smooth as possible. Mark Tucker is dedicated to delivering unparalleled workmanship and attention to detail, ensuring that every customer is thrilled with the results.
About My Dent Guy
My Dent Guy is a leading provider of paintless dent repair services in Naples, FL. My Dent Guy offers convenient in-shop and mobile services for vehicles of all makes and models. His expertise utilizes state-of-the-art techniques and tools to provide efficient and cost-effective dent repairs, saving customers time and money. For more information or to schedule an appointment, visit
www.callmydentguy.com or call 239-564-3368.

author: Alvise Wollner
title: Il parroco accoglie i senzatetto in chiesa, i fedeli raccolgono le firme per cacciarlo
text:
/ Treviso
Il parroco accoglie i senzatetto in chiesa, i fedeli raccolgono le firme per cacciarlo
Rivolta contro don Giovanni Kirschner e la sua politica di accoglienza verso migranti e meno fortunati: "Dopo tanti anni Ã¨ ora che se ne vada"
La bella storia di accoglienza e solidarietÃ  con protagonista il parroco di Santa Maria del Sile (Treviso) che, nelle scorse settimane, aveva aperto le porte della chiesa a sei migranti e senzatetto rimasti fuori dal dormitorio di via Pasubio, non Ã¨ andata giÃ¹ ad alcuni residenti del quartiere trevigiano. In queste ore Ã¨ stata preparata una raccolta firme cartacea, indirizzata al vescovo Michele Tomasi per chiedere che don Giovanni Kirschner venga sollevato dal suo incarico e sostituito al piÃ¹ presto.
Come riportato da "Antenna 3", diversi residenti sarebbero esasperati dai comportamenti dei sei ospiti attualmente accolti nella chiesa della parrocchia. Al mattino i senza dimora sono stati visti fare i loro bisogni a cielo aperto, uno dei migranti starebbe dormendo in una tenda mentre un altro richiedente asilo si aggirerebbe per il quartiere urlando frasi come "La fine Ã¨ vicina", rendendo la convivenza tra residenti e senza dimora sempre piÃ¹ difficile. La petizione Ã¨ stata stampata e la petizione sembra destinata a montare ancor di piÃ¹ nelle prossime ore.

author: Kathleen Ortiz
title: How Wyatt Langford's 'flat-out hustle' on a wild play led to the Rangers' winning run
text:
ARLINGTON â€” It took only 10 seconds for Wyatt Langford to sprint from first to home in the seventh inning to score the Texas Rangers â€™ winning run against the Athletics on Wednesday night at Globe Life Field. â€œThatâ€™s just flat-out hustle,â€ manager Bruce Bochy said after the 2-1 win. â€œThatâ€™s just playing the game right. Assuming the ball is going to be caught, busting it all the way. Thatâ€™s what speed does and itâ€™ll win the game for us.â€
Langford drew a two-out walk in the bottom of the seventh inning. Jonah Heim followed with a fly ball to left-center field. Athleticsâ€™ shortstop Jacob Wilson and left fielder Tyler Soderstrom tracked the ball into shallow left-center field, but they pulled away and let it drop between them.
The Rangers have taken the lead in the 7th on ... this play?
Wyatt Langford shows why you always run hard on the basepathsðŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸ðŸ’¨ #AllForTX pic.twitter.com/x6yOXNKDBh

author: apolonio alvarado
title: Â¡Cuidado! Sordera, otro de los peligros ocultos de la pirotecnia
text:
Â¡Cuidado! Sordera, otro de los peligros ocultos de la pirotecnia
COMPARTIR
Las fiestas decembrinas, sinÃ³nimo de celebraciÃ³n y alegrÃ­a, traen consigo tradiciones llenas de color y ruido, donde la pirotecnia juega un papel central para muchas familias. Sin embargo, tras los vibrantes destellos y estruendos de estos artefactos, se esconde un riesgo significativo para la salud auditiva: el daÃ±o por traumatismo acÃºstico, ademÃ¡s de las quemaduras y amputaciones que algunos niÃ±os sufren con la quema de cuetes.
En [Coahuila](https://coahuila.gob.mx/), aunque estÃ¡ prohibida la venta de cuetes, las redes sociales han resultado un fanÃ¡stico escaparate para los vendedores de estos artefactos.
TE PUEDE INTERESAR: [Cansada del maltrato, mujer denuncia a su esposo por violencia familiar, en Saltillo](https://vanguardia.com.mx/coahuila/saltillo/cansada-del-maltrato-mujer-denuncia-a-su-esposo-por-violencia-familiar-en-saltillo-IE14450796)
Especialistas en salud auditiva advierten que los niveles de sonido tolerados por el oÃ­do humano oscilan entre 65 y 80 decibelios (dB). No obstante, explosiones pirotÃ©cnicas pueden alcanzar intensidades de 140 a 160 dB, muy por encima del umbral de seguridad auditiva establecido en 110 dB. Estas intensidades, especialmente si ocurren a menos de 100 metros de distancia, pueden causar desde una pÃ©rdida temporal de audiciÃ³n hasta sordera permanente.
Dulce MarÃ­a GarcÃ­a Jacuinde, mÃ©dico audiÃ³loga, explica:
â€œEl traumatismo acÃºstico, provocado por la exposiciÃ³n a ruidos intensos, puede causar daÃ±o auditivo tanto temporal como permanente. Ante este tipo de lesiÃ³n, recomendamos una intervenciÃ³n temprana con especialistas en salud auditiva para minimizar el impactoâ€.
Entre las soluciones tecnolÃ³gicas mÃ¡s avanzadas destacan los implantes cocleares y los audÃ­fonos de Ãºltima generaciÃ³n, diseÃ±ados para restaurar la capacidad auditiva incluso en casos de pÃ©rdida severa. Estas tecnologÃ­as, respaldadas por resonadores mÃ©dicos y otros dispositivos, representan una esperanza para quienes sufren daÃ±o auditivo.
LOS RIESGOS DE LA PIROTECNIA EN CIFRAS
De acuerdo con la OrganizaciÃ³n Mundial de la Salud (OMS), la exposiciÃ³n frecuente a ruidos fuertes daÃ±a las cÃ©lulas sensoriales del oÃ­do y otras estructuras internas, causando pÃ©rdida auditiva inducida por ruido. Durante las festividades, el uso de pirotecnia, acompaÃ±ado de mÃºsica a alto volumen, incrementa notablemente este riesgo, especialmente en niÃ±os y adultos que subestiman los efectos nocivos del ruido.
La hipoacusia provocada por explosiones fuertes puede perforar el tÃ­mpano o daÃ±ar los huesecillos del oÃ­do medio, causando pÃ©rdida auditiva inmediata y, en algunos casos, irreversible. Aunque ciertos deterioros temporales se recuperan en uno o dos dÃ­as, los efectos residuales a largo plazo son comunes.
SÃNTOMAS DE ALERTA ANTE EL DAÃ‘O AUDITIVO
Especialistas seÃ±alan que los siguientes signos pueden indicar una pÃ©rdida auditiva:
>Zumbidos constantes en los oÃ­dos (tinnitus).
>Dolor en el oÃ­do.
>DistorsiÃ³n de palabras o sonidos.
>Dificultad para escuchar sonidos agudos o entender conversaciones.
>No percibir adecuadamente mÃºsica o televisiÃ³n en volÃºmenes moderados.
>Sangrado en el oÃ­do o sensaciÃ³n de desequilibrio.
LA IMPORTANCIA DE LA PREVENCIÃ“N
Ante cualquier sÃ­ntoma tras la exposiciÃ³n a ruidos intensos, es fundamental buscar atenciÃ³n mÃ©dica inmediata. Una intervenciÃ³n oportuna puede marcar la diferencia entre una recuperaciÃ³n parcial o total, mejorando significativamente la [calidad de vida](https://vanguardia.com.mx/noticias/internacional/cuales-son-los-mejores-y-peores-lugares-para-vivir-en-america-MP14399764) del paciente.
Durante estas fiestas, proteger los oÃ­dos, evitar la exposiciÃ³n prolongada a sonidos intensos y educar a la poblaciÃ³n sobre los riesgos del ruido son acciones clave para celebrar con responsabilidad y cuidar nuestra salud auditiva.

title: DOJ Sides Against Hearst In Battle Over Video Privacy Law 04/10/2025
text: The Video Privacy Protection Act, passed in 1988, â€œserves the governmentâ€™s substantial interest in protecting consumer privacy and intellectual freedom,â€ the Justice Department argues.
